 //return result;

CxList personal_info = Find_Personal_Info();

personal_info = personal_info - Find_Strings();

CxList outputs = Find_Outputs();
CxList db = Find_DB();

result = outputs.InfluencedByAndNotSanitized(personal_info, db);
